scripts.pack:win: ./node_modules/.bin/electron-packager . $npm_package_productName --app-version=$npm_package_version --version=0.37.8 --out=builds --ignore='^/builds$' --ignore='assets' --ignore='www/node_modules' --ignore='www/scss' --ignore='install' --ignore='iGurbani.sqlite' --platform=win32 --arch=x64 --asar=true --version-string.CompanyName='Khalis, Inc.' --version-string.LegalCopyright='Copyright (C) 2016 Khalis, Inc.' --version-string.FileDescription=$npm_package_productName --version-string.OriginalFilename='SikhiToTheMax.exe' --version-string.InternalName=$npm_package_productName --version-string.ProductName=$npm_package_productName --version-string.ProductVersion=$npm_package_version --icon='assets/STTME.ico' --overwrite && cp iGurbani.sqlite builds/SikhiToTheMax-win32-x64/resources/iGurbani.sqlite && cd builds && zip -rq -X sttme-win32.zip SikhiToTheMax-win32-x64
